ENC.MC.summary: ENCE EnergÃ­a y Celulosa, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells eucalyptus pulp and renewable energy in Germany, Spain, Italy, Poland, Turkey, France, the United Kingdom, Austria, Greece, Portugal, Slovenia, the Netherlands, and internationally. It offers bleached eucalyptus kraft pulp; and forest land management and forestry services, as well as produces renewable energy using forestry and agricultural biomass, and thermo solar sources. The company also purchases and sells timber. It manages 67,673 hectares of productive forest in Spain. The company was formerly known as Grupo Empresarial ENCE, S.A. and changed its name to ENCE EnergÃ­a y Celulosa, S.A. in April 2012. ENCE EnergÃ­a y Celulosa, S.A. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

IBG.MC.summary: Iberpapel GestiÃ³n, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, sells, and exports writing and printing paper in Spain, rest of European Union, Africa, South America, and internationally. The company operates through Paper, Gas Power Cogeneration, and Forestry and Other segments. It offers paper for bags and packaging, as well as label face products. The company also generates 10 Mwh of electricity through biomass; and 50 Mwh of electricity through gas cogeneration. In addition, it owns and manages 25,778 hectares of land in Spain, Argentina, and Uruguay. Further, the company is involved in the reforestation and forestry operations; and sale of timber. Iberpapel GestiÃ³n, S.A. was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in San SebastiÃ¡n, Spain.

MCM.MC.summary: Miquel y Costas & Miquel, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells fine and specialty lightweight papers in Spain. The company offers papers for the cigarette industry; printing, rolling, and specialty papers; and specialty textile pulps for industrial uses, as well as colored papers and cardboards. It also exports its products. Miquel y Costas & Miquel, S.A. was founded in 1725 and is headquartered in Barcelona, Spain.
